Parameter.Name: Input Raster
Parameter.Description: The raster dataset to be processed.

Parameter.Name: Field Name for Raster to Polygon
Parameter.Description: The field name used for converting raster to polygon.

Parameter.Name: Unique Value of Selected Field
Parameter.Description: The unique value in the specified field to retain.

Parameter.Name: Output Feature Class
Parameter.Description: The output feature class for the processed building footprints.

tool.name: PostDeepLearningBuildingsWorkflows
tool.displayname: Post Processing Buildings from Raster Output
tool.toolboxalias: Toolbox for post-processing deep learning results

param.name: in_raster
param.datatype: Map Server or Raster Data Layer or Image Service or Mosaic Dataset or Raster Dataset or Raster Layer or Raster Data Layer
param.dialogReference: Input raster with building class. For example the output raster of classify pixels using deep learning geoprocessing tool.

param.name: field_name
param.displayname: Field Name for Raster to Polygon
param.dialogReference: Field in the raster with building class value.

tool.summary: This tool is designed to process building footprints extracted from deep learning models. The workflow includes several steps to refine and regularize the building polygons.

idCitation.resTitle: Post Processing Buildings from Raster Output
